description:
This is a course about how to implement C# networking programming skills in a real project. It is an intermediate level course. In order to proceed with this course, you have to be familiar with the basics of C# language, especially, with the Socket, TcpListener, NetwrokStreaming and Threading concepts.

We will take you to each step of the course in full details, nothing is going to be escaped. For the best result, pause each video several time and practice the exact code we work on. First, we will develop the UI for the project, then the code behind the interface will be developed and explained in full details.

The topics you will implement through this course in a real project, are the TcpListener, Sockets, NetworkStreaming, and Threading in C# programming language. These are the main topics, but several other concepts will be also discussed during the course.

At the end, we will have a real project of Bank Queue Simulation System developed in C#, and you will be able to implement your skills of networking programming in other similar real projects.
title: Bank Queue Simulation Project in C#
